objects.description: RedLeaves can obtain the hostname, OS version number, platform, memory information, time elapsed since system startup, and CPU information. (Citation: PWC Cloud Hopper Technical Annex April 2017)

external_references.description: PwC and BAE Systems. (2017, April). Operation Cloud Hopper: Technical Annex. Retrieved April 13, 2017.
external_references.source_name: PWC Cloud Hopper Technical Annex April 2017
